name: Smarter Financials
description: Smart-Bill.co.uk is a digital assistant that uses open banking and AI to auomatically save users money by analysing their spending and finding better products/services for them.

jobs.title: Technical Lead Developer
jobs.description:
You will be working directly with an experienced CTO and serial entrepreneur who will be guiding your development into a star technologist.  If you do well you will be accelerated into a senior technology role and be managing a team of developers.

Your will be offered shares and we will cover your expenses until the funding is closed.

Technical Requirements
3+ years programming with one of the following: Ruby, Python, Java or C#,
Good understanding of Web Architecture (Data layer, Business, Presentation) and development patterns like MVC.
Working with some Full Stack Development Framework  like RubyOnRails, Django, Java (Hibernate, Spring etc)
Worked on building some UI (HTML5/CSS/JS(JQuery/React))

Work Experience
2+ years experience in working and managing a team
Working with Agile development methodology and SCRUM
Proven experience on managing the full development cycle
Understanding of writing and defining Use Cases and converting them to software artifacts
Has worked on client facing roles to extract user requirements and explain complexity in design solutions; explain trade offs in proposed solutions

Like to Have
Knowledge/Experience of AI in the NLP space
Worked in Fintech/Openbanking
Experience with Functional programming (Clojure, F#, Scarla, Haskel)

Academic Qualification
Computer Science Degree level (2.1 or higher) or Masters in Computer Science

jobs.title: Technical Lead Developer
jobs.description:
Smarter Financial Ltd, young and exciting company operating the Fintech/AI/Bigdata/OpenBanking space. 

We have built a radical new platform that helps customers save money by analyzing their spending. We typically save customers 300 pounds per year.  We have over 1000 users and are entering the B2B space.

Smarter Financials was incubated within a software development company but is now looking to scale out and be independent.  After a recent series of successes including gaining EIS/SEIS status and FCA registration. We are now in the process of raising financial capital through high net worth investors in a seed round.

Technical:

3+ years programming with one of the following: Ruby, Python, Java or C#,

Good understanding of Web Architecture (Data layer, Business, Presentation) and development patterns like MVC.

Working with some Full Stack Development Framework  like RubyOnRails, Django, Java (Hibernate, Spring etc)

Worked on building some UI (HTML5/CSS/JS(JQuery/React))

Experience:

2+ years experience in working and managing a team

Working with Agile development methodology and SCRUM

Proven experience on managing the full development cycle

Understanding of writing and defining Use Cases and converting them to software artifacts

Has worked on client facing roles to extract user requirements and explain complexity in design solutions; explain trade offs in proposed solutions.
Experience of OpenBanking is an advantage.
